originalText.text: Janet and team did a great job for our 3 year old and rapidly growing company. We engaged Odgis + Co for a full rebranding effort, including website development. They met us where we were in our growth trajectory, carefully navigated a lot of strong, sometimes conflicting, viewpoints and turned our perspectives into a unified and impactful brand. The quality of the designs and visual artifacts is the best I have ever had at my disposal. I strongly recommend Odgis + Co.

text.text: Janet and team did a great job for our 3 year old and rapidly growing company. We engaged Odgis + Co for a full rebranding effort, including website development. They met us where we were in our growth trajectory, carefully navigated a lot of strong, sometimes conflicting, viewpoints and turned our perspectives into a unified and impactful brand. The quality of the designs and visual artifacts is the best I have ever had at my disposal. I strongly recommend Odgis + Co.

originalText.text: In short, Janet and her team at Odgis are amazing.  They are forward-thinking designers with great sensibilities and commercial instincts.  As a senior partner in a major global law firm, I worked with them for over a dozen years on a significant annual thought-leadership piece.  And earlier this year, I again hired the firm to help the data analytics company I recently co-founded create its brand identity.  This demonstrates their incredible range and ability to understand businesses at different points in their life cycle.  And in each case they are a true pleasure to work with and the product and service delivered by Janet and her team was A+.

originalText.text: Janet and her team assisted our company with a logo redesign, new website and brand refresh.  From the start, Janet and her team were methodical and insightful in presenting us with examples and ideas of what our new branding should be. Janet laid out a timeline for this entire project and delivered all to us either on or before deadline dates.  We highly recommend Odgis & Co. and found them to be a very thoughtful, creative and well organized team.

originalText.text: Janet and her team are smart problem solvers and very creative designers. Their work always elevates the conversations I have with clients.They care deeply about their clients' success and it comes through in their responsiveness. I highly recommend Janet and her team to any organization looking to elevate their brand.

originalText.text: We were extremely impressed with the work Janet and her Odgis + Co team did for our corporate re-branding.  They captured our unique culture and our new direction perfectly by providing a creative, fresh design, including business templates and other consumer products.  They were extremely responsive and demonstrated great customer service throughout the process.  We would use them again.
